constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 61 (Thursday, April 8, 2021)]
[House]
[Pages H1720-H1721]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LaMALFA:
H.R. 2414.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
[[Page H1721]]
Article I, Section 8, clause 1

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, and in addition to the Committees on Education and Labor, and Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Keep Vaccines Voluntary Act
